snippet: Jimi Hendrix’s “People, Hell and Angels,” which was released on Tuesday, is likely to be the last album of unreleased studio tracks from the tapes in his estate’s possession.
abstract: People, Hell and Angels, newly released recording of Jimi Hendrix's session tapes, is likely to be last album of unreleased studio tracks from the tapes in his estate’s possession.
lead_paragraph: Jimi Hendrix’s “People, Hell and Angels,” which was released on Tuesday, is likely to be the last album of unreleased studio tracks from the tapes in his estate’s possession.

headline.seo: ‘People, Hell and Angels,’ the Last of Hendrix
headline.main: Exhuming the Last of Hendrix’s Studio Sessions
headline.print_headline: Exhuming the Last of Hendrix’s Studio Sessions
